summary: Encapsulates a UniSpeech self‑supervised model adapted to generate x‑vector speaker embeddings, handling convolutional and TDNN layer size calculations, executing the forward inference, and offering utilities to freeze parts of the base or feature extraction modules for fine‑tuning.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate a high‑performance speaker embedding extractor into applications such as speaker verification, diarization, or voice‑based authentication, with flexible training control.
